A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A really terrible film that does not remotely deserve the ridiculously high critic average.

Glaring plot holes\, bad 'humour' that is frequently unfunny and unnecessary\, a complete lack of character development of all the major characters from The Force Awakens.

A film that alienates a huge proportion of the Star Wars fan base\, and disappoints frequently with bizarre scenes such as the 'Mary Poppins flying in space' moment\, not to mention the total wasted potential of Luke Skywalker in the movie.. anyway\, nothing more needs to be said beyond this being a terrible\, awful movie.
